Submit transfer is the motion of several data from one place to an additional. A collection of electronically-stored data could be relocated by literally relocating the digital storage space tool, such as a computer system diskette, hard drive, or compact disc from one location to an additional or by sending out the data over a telecom tool.

On the web, the File Transfer Protocol (FTP) is a typical means to move a file or reasonably handful of documents from one computer system to one more. For bigger data transfers (a solitary huge data or a big collection of data), data compression and gathering right into a solitary archive is frequently made use of.
